## ShaderHelper.linearDepthToNonLinear() method

Calculates the non-linear depth from linear depth

**Signature:**

```typescript
static linearDepthToNonLinear(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, depth: PBShaderExp, nearFar?: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

</td></tr>

**Returns:**
